targets.rawSql:
select time, mast.state 
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where mach.id = '3' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '20 seconds' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "Quantidade por hora" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '01' and mach.id = '3' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
-- $__timeFilter("time") and 
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time asc
limit 13

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "Número da ordem de produção"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'cor' as "Cor"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select time, sum(value) as "Contagem de peles"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3'
and mada.sensor_type = '01'
and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nmCliente' as "Cliente"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

SELECT extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc
limit 1

select (select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 3 and state in ('5','4') and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as UpTime,
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 3 and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as AllTime from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'espessuraFinal' as "Espessura Final"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT mada.time, mada.extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Descrição Evento Parada"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '24 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc

select (select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and state in ('5') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running with P.O",
(select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and state in ('4') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running without P.O",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and state in ('3') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Stopped machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and state in ('2') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Idle machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and state in ('1','0') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Offline",
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Total time" from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and sensor_id = 91 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and sensor_id = 91 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and sensor_id = 93 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and sensor_id = 94 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select time, (value) as "Vácuo"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3'
and mada.sensor_type = '06' and sensor_id < 90
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

select time, value as "Vácuo"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and mada.value between 100 and 500 
and mada.sensor_type = '06' and sensor_id < 90
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

select max(value) from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 3 and mada.value between 100 and 500
and sensor_type = '06'  and $__timeFilter(time)

select avg(value) from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 3 and mada.value between 100 and 500
and sensor_type = '06' and $__timeFilter(time)

select (max(value) - min(value)) as amplitude from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 3 and sensor_type = '06' and mada.value between 100 and 500 and $__timeFilter(time)

select cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2)) stddevsamp
 from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 3 and mada.value between 100 and 500
and sensor_type = '06' and $__timeFilter(time)

select 500/(6* cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2))) stddevsamp
 from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 3 and sensor_type = '06'  and mada.value between 100 and 500
and $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and sensor_id = 95 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select time, value as "Temperatura"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3'
and mada.sensor_type = '02' and sensor_id != 95
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

select time, value as "Temperatura"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '3' and mada.value > 25
and mada.sensor_type = '02' and sensor_id != 95
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

select max(value) from machines_data md
where machine_id = 3 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Maximum temperature reached in the period

targets.rawSql:
select avg(value) from machines_data md
where machine_id = 3 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Average temperature reached in the period

targets.rawSql:
select (max(value) - min(value)) as amplitude from machines_data md
where machine_id = 3 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

select cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2)) stddevsamp
 from machines_data md
where machine_id = 3 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Standard deviation of the sample in the period

targets.rawSql:
select 2/(6* cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2))) stddevsamp
 from machines_data md
where machine_id = 3 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

select time, sum(value) as "Contagem de peles"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 3
and mada.sensor_type = '16'
and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "Hourly consumption" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '16' and mach.id = '3' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
and $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time desc
limit 13

select time, sum(value) * 0.677 as "Contagem de peles"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 3
and mada.sensor_type = '16'
and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1

panels.title: Amount of cost of electrical consumption

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value)* 0.677 as "Cost per hour" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '16' and mach.id = '3' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
and $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time desc
limit 13
